scripts.build: npm run bundle && npm run sloc && npm run size && npm run doc && npm run toc
scripts.doc: npx jsdoc2md --no-gfm src/typedefs.js src/parser/chordParserFactory.js src/renderer/chordRendererFactory.js> API.md
scripts.sloc: echo "Source code:" > SLOC && npx sloc src >> SLOC && echo "Tests:" >> SLOC && npx sloc tests >> SLOC && echo "Total:" >> SLOC && npx sloc src tests >> SLOC
scripts.toc: npx markdown-toc -i --maxdepth 4 README.md && npx markdown-toc -i --maxdepth 4 MIGRATION.md
